actions.name: Emergency Exit

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an attack that reduces its HP to 50% or lower.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an attack that reduces its HP to 50% or lower.
Effect: Connection - U-Turn. The user freely moves up to half of a Movement Score of their choice, and freely attacks an valid target with U-Turn.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an attack that reduces its HP to 50% or lower.
Effect: Connection - U-Turn. The user freely moves up to half of a Movement Score of their choice, and freely attacks an valid target with U-Turn.
